name: Ocean's Crown DEMO
description:
The Ocean's Crown calls out to you.

A 3D Metroidvania with a focus on parkour-style platforming. It's quite short, but hopefully just long enough to get its hooks in you. Made in 9 days. Hope you enjoy it!

Credits:

  • Game by Matt Davis - @MattDavisGames on Twitter
  • Music by Adam Bow - @adambowmusic on Twitter

Controls:

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Look - Mouse
  • Restart from checkpoint - R
  • Restart game - 0
